title: Lockwatch v2.4.1 [Premium].apk
description:
Description
Is someone snooping around on your phone? Are you worried about a lost or stolen phone? Find your lost or stolen phone with Lockwatch.
***** - "Left my phone on a plane. I had 10 photos and a GPS location showing exactly where my phone was."
***** - "Amazing app. Sends you a picture and it's very discrete. Everyone should have this."

Lockwatch emails you with a photo and GPS location when someone tries to unlock your phone with the wrong password. Find out if someone is trying to unlock your phone or locate the thief that has stolen it.

FEATURES
- Takes a photo of the intruder using the front camera when the wrong password is
  entered. (Minimum 4 digits must be entered.)
- Determines the phone location using GPS and WiFi so you can locate it.
- Immediately emails you with a photo and GPS location in case the phone is
  switched off.
- Completely silent and invisible operation. No warnings are shown to the intruder
  (The GPS icon may appear but does not identify our app.)
- No need for a third-party lock screen. We use the lock screen built into Android.
- Little to no impact on your battery. The app runs only when the wrong password is
  entered.
- Advanced options to detect SIM card changes, take multiple photos, record sound,
  send an SMS to a friend and more!

 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bloketech.lockwatch" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bloketech.lockwatch</a>


* Premium features unlocked


Enjoy!
